rules_text:
Incarnate {2}{R}{R} [i](If you cast this for its incarnate cost, as it resolves, merge it over target creature you own as an Avatar. It keeps all abilities from under it.)[/i]
Exile the top two cards of your library. You may play those cards this turn.
Flying
You may incarnate Permanence Is Temporary from your graveyard by exiling another instant or sorcery card from your graveyard as an additional cost.
